call_purpose: demonstration of PCRM and AI features
discussion of redesign from PCR9 to PCR10

resolution_tracking.outstanding_action_items: send video link for further review

relationship_health.overall_satisfaction_indicators: Moderate, as the customer is exploring new features but has concerns about the system's modernity and efficiency.
relationship_health.trust_level_signals: Moderate, customer is willing to discuss concerns and explore new features but also compares with other products.
relationship_health.communication_style: Open and direct, with the customer expressing concerns and needs clearly.
relationship_health.rapport_quality: Good, as there is a friendly and respectful exchange of information and acknowledgment of past usage.

customer_journey_stage.onboarding_status: Advanced, customer is familiar with older versions and exploring new updates.
customer_journey_stage.product_adoption_level: Moderate, as the customer is currently using a competitor's product but shows interest in new features.
customer_journey_stage.feature_utilization: Exploratory, customer is being introduced to new features and functionalities.
customer_journey_stage.expansion_opportunities: High, especially if new features meet the customer's evolving needs and can outperform competitors.

retention_factors.satisfaction_drivers: Feature updates, modern interface, integration capabilities.
retention_factors.risk_indicators: Comparison with competitors, previous experiences of clunky features, potential high transition costs.
retention_factors.loyalty_signals: Previous long-term usage, openness to consider re-adoption.
retention_factors.advocacy_potential: Dependent on satisfaction with new features and overall system improvements.

communication_preferences.response_time_expectations: Prompt, as indicated by real-time discussions and immediate feedback.
communication_preferences.information_style_preferences: Detailed demonstrations, direct answers to specific queries.
communication_preferences.decision-making_patterns: Informed, compares features and efficiency against competitors before making decisions.
